subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] For Stefan or anyone else interested !!!
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Ron,

you need WinRAR to uncompress the file. I tried to upload the unpacked
.exe file to the Files section, but Yahoo complained it was too big. :-(

So I uploaded it to a free file hoster:
http://www.freevix.org/data/12650/10698/evp_assistant_v1.exe

You might also want to try EVPmaker:
http://www.stefanbion.de/evpmaker/index_e.htm

Stefan

-- 

> Hi stefan I checked out the evpuk site but can't get the download. Not
> sure of the unzip process but I think I should be able to handle the
> download at my end. Any other options. I am in Mexico and can't seem
> to get reliable radio signals with my RS hacks. Maype a computer based
> program like evpuk might be my best option. Ron l
